name: Lazy Movie Plot Maker 2000
description:
Introducing: Lazy Movie Plot Maker 2000

The innovative must-have tool for any film-maker. The LMPM2000 will help you write the most original and exciting film-scripts on the market, with more than 28,000 ideas of all kinds.

BOOST YOUR CREATIVITY... FOR FREE!

Tired of endless writing sessions? Say goodbye forever and take advantage of the time with a refreshing Piña Colada

The easiest user experiencie ON EARTH. Push and see the magic of the LMPM2000 burst.

JUST THREE BUTTONS TO MAKE THE BEST MOVIES EVER.

Be the next Academy Award for Best Original Screenplay with the help of the LMPM2000. Try it NOW! ✨

Controls

  • Push the button of a movie trope idea suggestion, you'll get three new options right after!
  • Keep pushing deeper and deeper until you're ready to put a title to the movie you have created choosing movie ideas
  • Share on social media and let the people praise your exciting movie!

LD48 entry made in 14 hours by:

  • Fran Gambero (@Takox)
  • Jesús Porras (@Limonerox)

Github Repository with all the assets and code developed for the game.
